name: BONES (Josh Perry)
description:
BEFRIEND GHOSTS, DODGE SKELETONS

Shoot hearts at the ghosts to make them your ghostly allies.

Skeletons can't feel love so don't try to befriend them. Only your ghost pals can protect you from the horde of skeletons.

Try to last as long as possible.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move, Z to shoot hearts

Made for Krassjam 13.
